metadata.name: 01_GENESIS
metadata.description:
Every new product begins life as a prototype, and the G31SHA Series of domestic aid robots is no different. Pure white with an oriental emboss pattern, drenched in blue light. The investors loved it.

Today all G31SHA robots are modelled off this very prototype

2800x3200px

- Includes a functional VRM 3D avatar of 01_GENESIS, usable across a number of desktop and VR platforms, as well as VRM compatible games
